titleStmt.title: The old gentleman's wish, or The reformed old gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Barksdale, Clement, 1609-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Barksdale bookseller in Cirencester.,

notesStmt.note: On the right side of the sheet: Authors and books.
Item at 1029:12 has been divided into 2 sheets.
Attributed to C.B., and identified as Wing B44 in unit 34, reel position 1029:12 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
